# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
- Examples of burner entities include burner mining drills and burner inserters.

### Errors when using stone furnaces
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that offshore pumps are working and have a sufficient water supply.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that boilers have fuel before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power network before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty and have a sufficient fluid supply.

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using belt groups
- Ensure that belt groups are not empty and have a sufficient item supply.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
